page.title: Configuration
page.body:
Configuring Fizzy done in two locations.

Configuration file

To change the systems configuration the fizzy.xml file in the configs directory under the root of the application can be changed. For a complete list of the configuration options visit the project website.

Customized templates & Layouts

Fizzy pages can be enriched with templates and layouts. These templates can be selected when adding or editing a page in the administrator section.

New templates and layouts can be placed in the custom directory under the application root. For a complete overview of templating and layout options visit the project website.

page.title: About Fizzy
page.body:
Fizzy is a lightweight, easy to deploy Content Management System to administer paginated content on a website. The system allows users to create, update and delete content on their site with ease.

The dependencies for Fizzy are kept to a minimum, but can be extended by any PHP programmer. In it's most basic form Fizzy does not require a database and stores all its data in XML files.

page.title: Congratulations
page.body:
This is the default layout for Fizzy. You are seeing this page because you did not configure a default layout and template. See the Configuration page for more information about configuring Fizzy.

If you want to know more about Fizzy, check the About page or visit the project website by clicking the more link.

You can administer your website by going to the administrator page. There you can change the content of your site and add users. The default username and password for the administrator section is "admin". Please change this to something more appropriate.
